casebody.data:
People ex rel. Hall, Appellant, v. Village of Little Falls, Respondent. (Supreme Court, General Term, Fourth Department. December 7, 1889.)

Argued before Martin, Merwin, and Parker, JJ.

H. Clay Hall, pro se. E. J. Coffeen and A. M. Mills, for respondent.

No opinion. Order affirmed, with $10 costs and disbursements, on opinion of Williams, J., delivered at special term, ante, 512.
